comment: Smart Data Models - Pss1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/Pss1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian PSS - three input PSS (speed, frequency, power).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Frequency power input gain (K).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpe
contents.comment: Electric power input gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: PSS gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kw
contents.comment: Shaft speed power input gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pmin
contents.comment: Minimum power PSS enabling (P).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t10
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Washout (T).  Typical Value = 3.5. Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t7
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t8
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t9
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tpe
contents.comment: Electric power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: vadat
contents.comment: Default: False

contents.name: vsmn
contents.comment: Stabilizer output max limit (V).  Typical Value = -0.06. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsmx
contents.comment: Stabilizer output min limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.06. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
